question: Duas so i can excel in my computer programming
answer:
QUESTION

I am a computer programmer and iam average in programming. because of which iam lacking behind from others in company. Mufti saheb i want to be a expert in my field,Please give me some dua and verses of quran to recite so that i can gain knowledge and becaome a expert in programing

ANSWER


Share:

In order to gain knowledge and become an expert in computer programming, most importantly for gaining any type of lawful knowledge, the following verse can be recited to increase a persons knowledge, Rabbi zidni ilmaa Translation: O Allah increase me in knowledge.

These two Duaas could also be recited:

Allahumma ultuf fi tayseeri kulli aseerin fa inna tayseera kulli aseerin alaika yaseerun wa asalookal yusra wal mu?aafata fid dunyaa wal aakhira.

Rabbi yassir wa laa tuassir wa tammim bilkhair wa bika nastaeen yaa fattaahu yaa aleemu

Insha-Allah, after reciting anyone of the above Allah Ta?ala will increase your knowledge.

And Allah Taala knows best,

Mufti Muhammad Ashraf
